description:
Why settle for one color when you can have three? Perfect for runners and cyclists, this rechargeable armband lets you switch between vibrant colours without worrying about replacing batteries.

  • Lightweight, adjustable and chafe-free
  • Settings for blinking or steady stream lights and switch between 3 colour modes: red, green and blue
  • 8 hours (steady on) 16 hours (flashing)
  • IPX4 water proofing resists splashing or light rain
  • Lithium-ion battery recharges via USB
name: Nathan Light Bender RX
